title: "Edward Scissorhands": A Free 25th Anniversary Screening
desc: Please join SVA Theatre for a special 25th anniversary presentation of Tim Burton's modern classic,  Edward Scissorhands , shown on the big screen. ?The film premiered on December 14th, 1990. ? Synopsis: ?A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation. ?Starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Alan Arkin, and Dianne Wiest. Directed by Tim Burton. Running time: 105 minutes. ? Edward Scissorhands ?is rated PG-13, and may not be suitable for younger children. We ask parents not to bring children under the age of six. ? Ticket Information This event is free and open to the public. ? Seating is on a first-come, first-served basis. ? An Eventbrite reservation does not guarantee you a seat.  ?General Admission RSVPs through Eventbrite are appreciated, but not necessary. You do not need to show your Eventbrite reservation for admission. ?Doors will open approximately 45 minutes prior to the screening. ? Concessions Information Concessions are not available for purchase at SVA Theatre. ?Guests are welcome to bring food and drink. ?Glass bottles are not permitted. Please contact svatheatre@sva.edu with questions.
